org.afree.chart.title

Class LegendTitle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.chart.block.AbstractBlock
      • org.afree.chart.title.Title
        • org.afree.chart.title.LegendTitle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Block, Drawable

    public class LegendTitle
extends Title
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    A chart title that displays a legend for the data in the chart.

    The title can be populated with legend items manually, or you can assign a reference to the plot, in which case the legend items will be automatically created to match the dataset(s).

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
